sqlMap.select: SELECT ROW_DATA.* FROM( SELECT TOP 10 ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ID DESC) ROW, ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, USE_YN, REG_USER FROM SAMPLE ) ROW_DATA

SELECT EPP.* FROM ASW_POPUP EPP WHERE GETDATE() BETWEEN EPP.POPUP_START_DT AND ISNULL(EPP.POPUP_END_DT,GETDATE()) AND EPP.POPUP_STATUS_YN = 'Y'
EPP.POPUP_SEQ = #POPUP_SEQ#

SELECT EPP.POPUP_TITLE ,EPP.POPUP_REG_TP_FE ,(SELECT ATT.ATTCH_FILE_PATH from ASW_G_ATTCH ATT where ATT.ATTCH_CD = EPP.ATTCH_CD) as ATTCH_FILE_PATH ,EPP.POPUP_CONT ,EPP.POPUP_OPEN_TP_WLM ,EPP.POPUP_WIN_WIDTH ,EPP.POPUP_WIN_HEIGHT ,EPP.POPUP_CENTER_YES_NO ,EPP.POPUP_CLOSE_DAY ,EPP.POPUP_CLOSE_COLOR ,EPP.POPUP_CLOSE_SIZE FROM ASW_POPUP EPP WHERE EPP.POPUP_SEQ = #POPUP_SEQ#

SELECT EBL.BANNER_CD, EBL.BANNER_TITLE, EBL.BANNER_LOCAL_CD, GA.ATTCH_FILE_PATH, ISNULL(MGA.ATTCH_FILE_PATH, GA.ATTCH_FILE_PATH) AS ATTCH_MOBILE_FILE_PATH, EBL.BANNER_LINK, EBL.BACKG_ROUND_COLOR FROM ASW_BANNER_LIST EBL LEFT OUTER JOIN ASW_G_ATTCH GA ON EBL.ATTCH_CD = GA.ATTCH_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ASW_G_ATTCH MGA ON EBL.ATTCH_MOBILE_CD = MGA.ATTCH_CD WHERE EBL.BANNER_STATUS = 'Y'
AND EBL.BANNER_START_DT <= GETDATE() AND (EBL.BANNER_END_DT IS NULL OR EBL.BANNER_END_DT >= GETDATE())
ORDER BY EBL.BANNER_LOCAL_CD, EBL.BANNER_TITLE ASC, REG_DT DESC

SELECT TOP 1 A.BOARD_MST_CD , A.BOARD_SEQ , A.BOARD_FIRST_YN , A.BOARD_CATE_SEQ , CASE WHEN A.BOARD_CATE_SEQ != '58' THEN '공지' ELSE B.BOARD_CATE_NM END AS BOARD_CATE_NM , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_HIT , A.BOARD_STATUS_YN , A.DATA_USER_TP_MA , CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),REG_DT,102) AS REG_DT FROM ASW_BOARD_BASE A, ASW_BOARD_CATE B WHERE A.BOARD_CATE_SEQ = B.BOARD_CATE_SEQ AND A.BOARD_MST_CD = 'BBM00067' AND A.BOARD_STATUS_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY A.BOARD_FIRST_YN desc, A.REG_DT DESC

SELECT TOP 1 A.BOARD_MST_CD , A.BOARD_SEQ , A.BOARD_FIRST_YN , A.BOARD_CATE_SEQ , CASE WHEN A.BOARD_CATE_SEQ != '58' THEN '공지' ELSE B.BOARD_CATE_NM END AS BOARD_CATE_NM , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_HIT , A.BOARD_STATUS_YN , A.DATA_USER_TP_MA , CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),REG_DT,102) AS REG_DT FROM ASW_BOARD_BASE A, ASW_BOARD_CATE B WHERE A.BOARD_CATE_SEQ = B.BOARD_CATE_SEQ AND A.BOARD_MST_CD = 'BBM00004' AND A.BOARD_STATUS_YN = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_FIRST_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.BOARD_SEQ DESC, A.REG_DT DESC

select a.TODAY_AS_COUNT, b.READY_AS_COUNT from (SELECT count(*) as TODAY_AS_COUNT FROM dbo.ASA200 a where CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),a.rec_dt,102) = convert(VARCHAR(10), getdate(), 102) and a.stat_bc in ( 'AS204100','AS204200' ) and a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD# ) a, (SELECT count(*) as READY_AS_COUNT FROM dbo.ASA200 a where a.stat_bc in ('AS204100','AS204200') and a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD# ) b
